name: Pocket Dimension
description: Teleport in and out of your own personal pocket dimension!

actions.command: execute store result storage limeorigins:storage posX int 1 run data get entity @s Position[0]
execute store result storage limeorigins:storage posY int 1 run data get entity @s Position[1]
execute store result storage limeorigins:storage posZ int 1 run data get entity @s Position[2]
execute store result @s position[0] run data get storage limeorigins:storage posX
execute store result @s position[1] run data get storage limeorigins:storage posY
execute store result @s position[2] run data get storage limeorigins:storage posZ
execute at @s unless entity @e[x=~-25,y=~-25,z=~-25,dx=50,dy=50,dz=50,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..0.1] run execute at @s run fill ~-25 ~-25 ~-25 ~25 ~25 ~25 minecraft:air
